ComicInfo.Summary:
*Cover to Cover*
The Wrong Cover The Correct CoverBecause of the printing error on issue #6 where the contents were reprinted of issue #5, Wasteland reissued a new blank cover with a black and white boarder. This reissue would be titled "The Real No. 6". The colored cover with a Silver Woman contains the wrong material inside.
